name: You lost your guns but you want to shoot shrek
name_original: You lost your guns but you want to shoot shrek
description:
Note: I fixed a bug with the rifle where you couldn't get it smh sorry lol

WASD to move

R to reload

the numbers on top of your keyboard let you switch weapons

there are three guns hidden in the map (including the pistol)
CAN YOu FINd ThemM ALL????

Kill S

hrek to win

Models are from https://kenney.nl/

Gun sounds from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
